Works fine. I had russian version, but english is much better:)

IF you have problems with saving, try this:

#1. navigate to your disciples 3 installation folder e.g. C:\Disciples III\
#2. create a folder called save  e.g. C:\Disciples III\save\
Works with Wine in Linux.  The only problem is the sound didn't work once in game but that should be an easy fix for the future.
